plot: Paul Goetz is the biggest fan of Arrested Development and seeks to prove it by starring in a web series in hopes that he might land a role in the fourth season.
plot_en: Paul Goetz is the biggest fan of Arrested Development and seeks to prove it by starring in a web series in hopes that he might land a role in the fourth season.
plot_es: Paul Goetz is the biggest fan of Arrested Development and seeks to prove it by starring in a web series in hopes that he might land a role in the fourth season.
title: Paul Goetz's Last Ditch Effort
